description: Families in practical catchment area
drivers: Base for penetration and customer count
source_detail: Client indication of 500+ families; refine with research

description: % of local households shopping primarily here in Year 1
drivers: Depends on competition and opening strategy
source_detail: Aggressive but realistic for strong local concept

description: % of households in Year 2
% of households in Year 3 and beyond
drivers: Represents mature share of local market
source_detail: Target share once store is established

description: Average visits per household per week
Average spend per visit in Year 1
drivers: Linked to income, positioning, specialty mix

description: Gross profit as % of net sales
Shrinkage as % of sales
Rebates and trade spend as % of sales
source_detail: Based on common vendor support for volume retailers

description: Wages for store staff excl. benefits as % of sales
Employer taxes & benefits as % of wages
Routine marketing and promotions
Regular and unexpected maintenance
drivers: Linked to equipment age and intensity

description: Average days of COGS held in inventory
Average days to pay suppliers
drivers: Impacts working capital and cash conversion

description: Maximum principal available for construction financing
drivers: Covers hard costs plus some soft costs

description: Annual interest rate during construction / I/O period
source_detail: In line with current SMB construction rates

description: Rate on post-construction term loan
source_detail: Conservative fixed rate for small CRE

description: Rate on shareholder/bridge debt
Target DSCR for loan compliance and safety
drivers: Impacts allowed debt load and distributions
source_detail: Common DSCR covenant for SMB loans

description: Annual inflation for non-food costs
drivers: Applied to many cost and some revenue lines

description: Annual wage growth
drivers: Reflects tight labor market and minimum wage trends

description: Annual inflation for COGS/food purchases
source_detail: To be cross-checked with USDA/industry forecasts

description: Discount rate for project NPV / feasibility
drivers: Reflects risk of single-store grocery startup

description: Minimum months of opex to hold in cash reserves
drivers: Informs minimum cash and funding needs
source_detail: Aligns with risk tolerance and lender comfort
